mapper.insert: INSERT INTO stu_info (stu_name, stu_num, stu_class, stu_academy, stu_major, openid, upload_times) VALUES (#{stuName}, #{stuNum}, #{stuClass}, #{stuAcademy}, #{stuMajor}, #{openid}, #{uploadTimes})
mapper.update: update stu_info set stu_name=#{stuName}, stu_num=#{stuNum}, stu_class=#{stuClass}, stu_academy=#{stuAcademy}, stu_major=#{stuMajor}, openid=#{openid}, upload_times=#{uploadTimes} where openid=#{openid}
